frontmatter.title: Bournemouth vs Everton Match Analysis - Premier League 2024
frontmatter.description: A detailed analysis of the Bournemouth vs Everton match in the Premier League 2024 season, highlighting key events and player performances.

sections.heading: Match Overview
paragraphs: In the Premier League clash on January 4, 2025, Bournemouth faced Everton at the Vitality Stadium. The home team managed to secure a 1-0 victory, showcasing their dominance in possession and offensive play.
bullets: The match took place at Vitality Stadium.

figures.alt: Pass network and formation for Bournemouth showing player positions and passing connections.

claims.claim: Bournemouth had a significant advantage in possession.
Bournemouth outperformed Everton in shots taken.
Bournemouth had a higher number of shots on target.

player_notes.summary: Solid performance as a goalkeeper, maintaining a clean sheet.
Defensive efforts noted, but team struggled overall.
